hudson.tasks.Shell.command: BASEURL=`readlink -f ${WORKSPACE}/../../repo-mirror/workspace/` ./autogen.sh --disable-mozilla --disable-binfilter --with-junit=${JENKINS_HOME}/junit-4.9b2.jar --with-num-cpus=4 --with-max-jobs=4 cat ${JENKINS_HOME}/set_tarfile_location.sh >> Env.Host.sh echo "export CCACHE_BASEDIR=\"${WORKSPACE}\"" >> Env.Host.sh mkdir -p clone [ -d ${WORKSPACE}/clone/help/.git ] \ || git clone ${BASEURL}/help.git ${WORKSPACE}/clone/help [ -d ${WORKSPACE}/clone/dictionaries/.git ] \ || git clone ${BASEURL}/dictionaries.git ${WORKSPACE}/clone/dictionaries cd ${WORKSPACE} ./g checkout `git name-rev --name-only HEAD` ./download ./g stash save ./g pull -r ./g -f stash pop ./g branch -v #./g --set-push-user YOURUSERNAMEHERE ./g branch -v make all && make dev-install . $WORKSPACE/Env.Host.sh && cd $WORKSPACE && $SOLARENV/bin/subsequenttests -j5 -k
